trans-unit.source: Provides a set of methods for identifying inherited components.
The InheritanceService can be used to find inherited components, select which ones to ignore, and retrieve the inheritance attribute of each inherited class that is tracked by the service.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.InheritanceService"></xref> class.
Adds the components inherited by the specified component to the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.InheritanceService"></xref>.
This method searches all the fields of all base classes of the specified component.
Each field that implements <xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent> is added to the specified container.
The component to search for inherited components to add to the specified container.
The container to add the inherited components to.
Adds the components of the specified type that are inherited by the specified component to the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.InheritanceService"></xref>.
This method searches all the fields of all base classes of component.

Each field that implements <xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent> is added to an internal list that stores an <xref:System.ComponentModel.InheritanceAttribute> that identifies the inheritance level of the component.
The component is then added to the specified container.
The base type to search for.
The component to search for inherited components to add to the specified container.
The container to add the inherited components to.
Releases all resources used by the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.InheritanceService"></xref>.
Calling Dispose allows the resources used by the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.InheritanceService> to be reallocated for other purposes.
For more information about Dispose, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.InheritanceService"></xref> and optionally releases the managed resources.
This method is called by the public `Dispose()`method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
`Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
<xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.InheritanceService> references.
This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
Gets the inheritance attribute of the specified component.
If the component is not inherited, this method returns the value <xref:System.ComponentModel.InheritanceAttribute>.
Otherwise, it returns the inheritance attribute for this component.
The component to retrieve the inheritance attribute for.
An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.InheritanceAttribute"></xref> that describes the level of inheritance that this component comes from.
Indicates whether to ignore the specified member.
The member to check.
This member is either a <xref:System.Reflection.FieldInfo> or a <xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo>.
The component instance this member is bound to.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified member should be included in the set of inherited components; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
